Xiexio Vehicles

Xiexio technology and telekinetic abilities have been used to produce all manner of vehicles, including Spacecraft.

Aircraft

Air Cloak

An air cloak is a heavy robe or other clothing fitted with a harness of strong seams which fit close to the body, and sufficient Jinxi to lift an adult Xiexio. They are an old and less-than-comfortable flight device once common among aristocracy, which are now seen as pretentious.

Air Board

An air board is a simple, streamlined construction, sometimes with handlebars, foot-locks, or luggage racks, which is levitated with the aid of Jinxi telekinesis. They are typically devoid of any form of propulsion other than the user's telekinesis, but some have integrated propulsion systems, or third-party propulsion systems may be attached. Alternatively, some have runners and small aerofoils so that the operator need only propel the board forward in order to generate lift.

Spacecraft

Space Suit

A space suit is a pressurised suit designed to used along with an air board or other vehicle designed for atmospheric use, in order to allow for short travel beyond atmospheres.

Egg

An egg is a pressurised capsule light enough that a single Xiexio may levitate it, and them in it, under normal gravity. It features only small propulsion systems and sufficient fuel for emergencies, but primarily is fired from cannon mounted upon Planets, Spires, Spacecraft, or other larger entities as a means of short range travel, such as air-drops.

Eggs are also sometimes used to deliver supplied, modules, and other goods across great distances, though the lack of an operator to ensure safe arrival means that targets are limited, or mechanisms must be fitted to accommodate this.

Personal Sphere

A personal sphere is a Spacecraft used primarily by official Spacers, independent explorers, and peacekeepers. They are entirely modular, but are designed to maintain a spherical configuration, especially when operating without an external atmosphere. Modules fitted with propulsion systems allow the vehicle to accelerate far more quickly than its operator could achieve through telekinesis alone. Since the mass of the vehicle always requires quantities of Jinxi beyond that which a Xiexio can control at once, or even hold together during the accelerations generated by the main propulsion systems, all modules are capable of coupling with others, and the vehicle must make use of its auxiliary engines to remain airborne within gravitational fields. The innermost modules of almost all personal spheres contain components capable of arrangement into an egg, or air Board and space suit.

Other

Cannon

A cannon is a device consisting of a loading bay, acceleration chamber, and chamber, designed to accelerate Eggs to sufficient speed for inter-planetary, or inter-spire travel. The acceleration chamber spins, or applies pressure to a sealed tube in order to accelerate an Egg just slowly enough that it does not injure the passenger. When the egg has sufficient velocity to reach the desired destination in the desired time frame it is loosed into the chamber, then out into Space.
